title: linux run "python setup.py install" failure.
body_html:
If you have a question or would like help and support, please ask at our
forums.

If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request].
If you are submitting a bug report, please fill in the following details.

Issue description

I have cloned pytorch master source code, after running shell #python setup.py install, I get an error like

yz@yz-sci:~/Libs/pytorch$ python setup.py install
running install
running build_deps
: 无效选项build_pytorch_libs.sh: 第 9 行: set: -
set: 用法: set [--abefhkmnptuvxBCHP] [-o 选项名] [--] [参数 ...]
tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh: 行 118: 未预期的符号 `elif' 附近有语法错误
'ools/build_pytorch_libs.sh: 行 118: `elif [[ "$REL_WITH_DEB_INFO" ]]; then

solution

I hava to new a file named build_pytorch_libs.sh, and open old "build_pytorch_libs.sh" file, copy all content to new build_pytorch_libs.sh. Installation success. The problem refer to the difference of linux and windows OS text formate.
body_text:
If you have a question or would like help and support, please ask at our
forums.
If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request].
If you are submitting a bug report, please fill in the following details.
Issue description
I have cloned pytorch master  source code, after running shell #python setup.py install, I get an error like
yz@yz-sci:~/Libs/pytorch$ python setup.py install
running install
running build_deps
: 无效选项build_pytorch_libs.sh: 第 9 行: set: -
set: 用法: set [--abefhkmnptuvxBCHP] [-o 选项名] [--] [参数 ...]
tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh: 行 118: 未预期的符号 `elif' 附近有语法错误
'ools/build_pytorch_libs.sh: 行 118: `elif [[ "$REL_WITH_DEB_INFO" ]]; then
solution
I hava to new a file named build_pytorch_libs.sh, and open old "build_pytorch_libs.sh" file, copy all content to new build_pytorch_libs.sh. Installation success. The problem refer to the difference of linux and windows OS text formate.
body: If you have a question or would like help and support, please ask at our [forums](https://discuss.pytorch.org/). If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request]. If you are submitting a bug report, please fill in the following details. ## Issue description I have cloned pytorch master source code, after running shell #python setup.py install, I get an error like ```shell yz@yz-sci:~/Libs/pytorch$ python setup.py install running install running build_deps : 无效选项build_pytorch_libs.sh: 第 9 行: set: - set: 用法: set [--abefhkmnptuvxBCHP] [-o 选项名] [--] [参数 ...] tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh: 行 118: 未预期的符号 `elif' 附近有语法错误 'ools/build_pytorch_libs.sh: 行 118: `elif [[ "$REL_WITH_DEB_INFO" ]]; then ``` ## solution I hava to new a file named build_pytorch_libs.sh, and open old "build_pytorch_libs.sh" file, copy all content to new build_pytorch_libs.sh. Installation success. The problem refer to the difference of linux and windows OS text formate.
